backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping Valentine flow changes to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of all frontend Valentine flow files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist verifying all 5 Valentine steps, static images, and NO-button behavior work.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH tokens and theme variables for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Confetti: Generates temporary falling confetti elements on screen.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Floating: Continuously spawns floating heart emojis upward as background animation.
frontend/src/features/valentine/hooks/me: LocalStorage helper for saving, loading, and clearing memory card images.
frontend/src/features/valentine/hooks/us: Deprecated hook returning hardcoded static memory images.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/At: First step presenting an intro message and a button to continue.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Fi: Final step showing YES/NO buttons; YES triggers confetti, NO shows playful message.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/He: Second step with a personalized greeting and a continue button.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Le: Fourth step displaying a short heartfelt note and a continue button.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Me: Third step showing three static memory images with captions and a continue button.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: Centered layout wrapper with fade-in animation for all steps.
Controls 5-step Valentine flow state and renders the current step.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor using the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for managing Internet Identity authentication, loading identities, and handling login/logout states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables with animations for hearts, confetti, and fade‑in effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global CSS.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, container queries, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current configuration, features, issues, and build instructions for a Valentine proposal web app.
